Uses of Package
jtxt.emulator.tui

  • Packages that use jtxt.emulator.tui 
    Package Description
    jtxt  
    jtxt.emulator  
    jtxt.emulator.tui  
  • Classes in jtxt.emulator.tui used by jtxt 
    Class and Description
    Component
    The root of all TUI components.
    Container
    A Container is a Component which owns and manages other Components.
    Layout
    Allocates the bounds of a Container's children, using objects passed to these children to determine the location in which they will be placed.
  • Classes in jtxt.emulator.tui used by jtxt.emulator 
    Class and Description
    Component
    The root of all TUI components.
    ComponentObserver 
    KeyboardTarget
    Indicates that a component wishes to be the target for receiving information about key presses when they are focused in the terminal.
    Layout
    Allocates the bounds of a Container's children, using objects passed to these children to determine the location in which they will be placed.
    RootContainer 
  • Classes in jtxt.emulator.tui used by jtxt.emulator.tui 
    Class and Description
    Axis 
    Border.Type
    The type of border to draw.
    Callable
    In order to receive notification of events which are generated by the terminal and routed to TUI components, a class must implement this interface and pass itself into an appropriate method for registering itself with a Component that it wishes to listen to.
    Component
    The root of all TUI components.
    ComponentObserver 
    Container
    A Container is a Component which owns and manages other Components.
    Decorator
    Adds dynamic runtime properties to a Component, thus allowing components to add properties like borders, outlines, and more generic aspects without having to explicitly inherit them from another component.
    GridLayout 
    GridLayout.Cell
    A region within this layout which a given component can request to occupy, unless the Cell is already occupied by another component.
    GridLayout.GridParameters
    The parameters which describe the Cells which a Component should occupy within this layout.
    Interactable
    A Component which implements this interface receives notifications whenever a mouse event is generated within its bounds.
    KeyboardTarget.Key 
    Layout
    Allocates the bounds of a Container's children, using objects passed to these children to determine the location in which they will be placed.
    Table.Column
    A column of components within the Container.
    TextBox.Position
    The position within the bounds of this component that the text should be justified in.
